verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, Thou alone art worthy Ceaseless praises to receive; For Thy love and grace and goodness Rise o’er all our thoughts conceive.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With adoring heart, we render Honor to Thy precious name, Overflowing with Thy mercies, Far and wide Thy worth proclaim.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Praise Him! praise Him! praise the Savior! Saints, aloud your voices raise, Praise Him! praise Him! till in glory Perfected we’ll sing His praise.
